h2_title: Where To Use The Keeness of Tiger in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Keeness of Tiger can be used on the Tallies located in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge to access the path under the Crouching Tiger Temple, and open the locked doors at Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair and Yellow Sand Formation - Windrest Gate Shrines. You will need to use this in conjunction with the Sterness of Stone Key Item, which can be found at Fright Cliff upon defeating the Stone Vanguard.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeness_of_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Keeness of Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Keeness of Tiger in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Keeness of Tiger can be used on the Tallies located in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge to access the path under the Crouching Tiger Temple, and open the locked doors at Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair and Yellow Sand Formation - Windrest Gate Shrines. You will need to use this in conjunction with the Sterness of Stone Key Item, which can be found at Fright Cliff upon defeating the Stone Vanguard.
